contentrichtext.text: {{About|the town in Iraq|other towns with the same name|Al-Qahtaniyah (disambiguation){{!}}Al-Qahtaniyah}} {{Location map|Iraq | lat_deg = 36 | lat_min = 13 | lat_sec = 52 | lat_dir = N | lon_deg = 41 | lon_min = 47 | lon_sec = 52 | lon_dir = E | caption = Location of Kahtaniya in Iraq }} '''Qahtaniyah''' ([[Arabic]] '''القحطانية''', also spelled Giruzer, Kar Izir) is [[Iraq|Iraqi]] town about {{convert|100|km|mi|abbr=on}} from [[Mosul]]. It was one of two villages targeted in the [[2007 Qahtaniya bombings]] against the local [[Yazidi]] community.<ref>[http://www.kurdistantv.net Kurdistan TV]</ref> ==References== {{Reflist}} {{coord|36|13|52|N|41|47|52|E|type:city|display=title}} [[Category:Kurdistan]] [[Category:Yazidi]]
